title: Ticket #6620: Add tests for multiple SUM and multiple PEAK tests per monitor.
description:
If it becomes necessary, we can further further elaborate on cmr-monitor-many-instances[-partitionable] by having each SQUID and each TAKO monitor report two SUM and two PEAK metrics each.

If it becomes necessary, we can speed the tests up considerably with a little more cleverness in the jobs and output-parsing code, by recording more than a single resource and metric in each job run.
creator: tlmiller
